org.smartfrog.services.dependencies.legacy.statemodel.utils
Class CDUtil

java.lang.Object
  org.smartfrog.services.dependencies.legacy.statemodel.utils.CDUtil

public class CDUtil
extends java.lang.Object

CDUtil contains a few utility methods for performing operations on component descriptions. More general versions of these methods are being implemented elsewhere in SmartFrog so it is expected that these will go away.

Version:
1.0
Author:
not attributable

Method Summary
static ComponentDescription copy(ComponentDescription cd)
          Make a copy of a component description
static boolean same(java.lang.Object obj1, java.lang.Object obj2)
          Same evaluates whether the two attribute values are the same: component descriptions are compared recursively, values that are lazy references are compared after dereferencing, but the method assumes that the initial object parameters are not lazy references.
static boolean same(java.lang.Object obj1, java.lang.Object obj2, ReferenceResolver rr)
          Same evaluates whether the two attribute values are the same: component descriptions are compared recursively, values that are lazy references are compared after dereferencing, and if the initial object parameters are lazy references they will be resolved against the given reference resolver.
static boolean same0(java.lang.Object obj1, java.lang.Object obj2)
          This method assumes the component descriptions do not contain any lazy references

same

public static boolean same(java.lang.Object obj1,
                           java.lang.Object obj2)
Same evaluates whether the two attribute values are the same: component descriptions are compared recursively, values that are lazy references are compared after dereferencing, but the method assumes that the initial object parameters are not lazy references. This method returns false if there is a resolution exception.

Parameters:
obj1 -
obj2 -
Returns:
whether two attribute values are the same
Throws:
SmartFrogResolutionException

same

public static boolean same(java.lang.Object obj1,
                           java.lang.Object obj2,
                           ReferenceResolver rr)
                    throws SmartFrogResolutionException
Same evaluates whether the two attribute values are the same: component descriptions are compared recursively, values that are lazy references are compared after dereferencing, and if the initial object parameters are lazy references they will be resolved against the given reference resolver.

Parameters:
obj1 -
obj2 -
Returns:
whether two attribute values are the same
Throws:
SmartFrogResolutionException
